item.title: How to Update
item.description: Updating KNOT is easy! You can just replace the old JAR files in the /dropins/ directory of your KNIME installation with the new ones.

item.title: Troubleshooting
item.description: KNIME needs too much memory Analyzing massive datasets with KNOT can require more than 16 GB of RAM. In the upcoming releases, we plan to adopt strategies to further optimize memory usage. In the meantime, running one single node at a time can help reduce memory usage. Splitting the original dataset in slices (e.g.: taking one week of data at a time) and processing each slice separately can also help.

item.title: FAQ
item.description: Hyas? Doks is a Hyas theme build by the creator of Hyas. Footer notice? Please keep it in place.
